title: Torsos
description: I collaborated with artist Adam Milner to process and visualize his personal database of 7000+ Grindr photos of torsos. Using computer vision and machine learning algorithms, we analyzed the images, extracting a feature vector for each. Then, we visualized the database in grids. Further processing revealed a series of hidden gems: pairings of strikingly similar torsos. These diptychs reveal the commonalities to expression within this app and its community at large.

captions.1: All photographs sorted in two-dimensional space. The closer two photos the more similar they appear.
captions.3: tSNE map of all images. Notice how photos with similar visual features clump together.
captions.5: Diptychs discovered by the algorithm. Each pair represents two distinct photos of different people with strikingly similar poses and attire.
